00007 VectorEffectRef VectorEffect::create(const StateVectorRef &s,

00009                                      const StateVariables &dimensions)
00010 {
00011   return VectorEffectRef(new VectorEffect(s, succ, dimensions));

00013 
00014 VectorEffect::VectorEffect(const StateVectorRef &s,
00015                            const StateVectorRef &succ,
00016                            const StateVariables &dimensions)
00017 {
00018   assert(dimensions.size() < 10);
00019   assert(s->size() == succ->size());
00020   StateVariables::const_iterator i;
00021   for (i = dimensions.begin(); i != dimensions.end(); ++i) {
00022     const unsigned index = i->first;
00023     assert(s->size() > index && succ->size() > index);
00024     const double diff = (*succ)[index] - (*s)[index];
00025     if (diff != 0)
00026       m_changes.push_back(std::make_pair(index, diff));
00027   }
00028 }
00029 
00030 VectorEffect::~VectorEffect()
00031 {}
00032 
00033 StateVectorRef VectorEffect::apply(const StateVectorRef &s) const
00034 {
00035   boost::shared_ptr<std::vector<double> > result(new std::vector<double>(*s));
00036   std::vector<std::pair<unsigned,double> >::const_iterator i;
00037   for (i = m_changes.begin(); i != m_changes.end(); ++i) {
00038     assert(result->size() > i->first);
00039     (*result)[i->first] += i->second;
00040   }
00041   return result;
00042 }
00043 
00044 void VectorEffect::debug(std::ostream &out) const
00045 {
00046   std::vector<std::pair<unsigned,double> >::const_iterator i;
00047   for (i = m_changes.begin(); i != m_changes.end(); ++i)
00048     out << i->first << (i->second > 0 ? ":+" : ":") << i->second << ";";
00049 }

00064 PrimitiveTask::PrimitiveTask(const std::string &name,
00065                              int primitive,

00110 StateActionModelRef PrimitiveTask::model(const StateVectorRef &s)
00111 {
00112   AverageRef average = averager()->approximate(s);
00113   PrimitiveStateActionModelWeakRef &m = m_models[average->state()];
00114   if (m.expired())
00115     return PrimitiveStateActionModel::create(m_this.lock(), average, m);
00116   else 
00117     return m.lock();
00118 }
00119 
00120 void PrimitiveTask::propagate_changes()
00121 {
00122   std::set<PrimitiveStateActionModelWeakRef>::iterator i;
00123   for (i = m_inbox.begin(); i != m_inbox.end(); ++i)
00124     if (!i->expired())
00125       i->lock()->compute_model();
00126   m_inbox.clear();
00127 }

00133   for (i = m_models.begin(); i != m_models.end(); ++i)
00134     i->second.lock()->debug(out);
00135   out << "end models\n";

00138 void PrimitiveTask::update(const StateVectorRef &s, double r, const StateVectorRef &succ)
00139 {
00140   PrimitiveStateActionData *dat = get_data(m_averager->add_basis(s));
00141   EffectCounts::value_type
00142     val(VectorEffect::create(s, succ, m_averager->dimensions()), 0);
00143   VectorEffectCountsComparator comparator;
00144   EffectCounts::iterator cnt =
00145     vector_set_insert(dat->effect_counts, val, comparator).first;
00146   ++cnt->second;
00147 
00148   update(dat, r);
00149 }
00150 
00151 void PrimitiveTask::update(const StateVectorRef &s, double r)
00152 {
00153   update(get_data(m_averager->add_basis(s)), r);
00154 }

00160 PrimitiveTask::PrimitiveStateActionModelRef
00161 PrimitiveTask::PrimitiveStateActionModel::
00162 create(const PrimitiveTaskRef &parent, const AverageRef &average,
00163        PrimitiveStateActionModelWeakRef &ref)
00164 {
00165   PrimitiveStateActionModelRef
00166     result(new PrimitiveStateActionModel(parent, average));
00167   ref = result->m_this = result;
00168   result->m_average->add_observer(result->m_this);
00169   result->compute_model();
00170   return result;
00171 }

00179 PrimitiveTask::PrimitiveStateActionModel::~PrimitiveStateActionModel()
00180 {
00181   std::vector<std::pair<StateVectorRef, PrimitiveStateActionData *> >::iterator i;
00182   for (i = m_translation.begin(); i != m_translation.end(); ++i)
00183     vector_set_erase(i->second->observers, m_this);
00184 
00185   m_average->remove_observer(m_this);
00186 }

00193 double PrimitiveTask::PrimitiveStateActionModel::reward() const
00194 {
00195   return m_sum < m_parent->m_threshold ? m_parent->m_maxval : m_r;
00196 }

00198 const EffectDistribution &
00199 PrimitiveTask::PrimitiveStateActionModel::effects() const
00200 {
00201   return m_sum < m_parent->m_threshold ? s_empty : m_effects_map;
00202 }

00204 void PrimitiveTask::PrimitiveStateActionModel:: observe_average_change()
00205 {
00206   m_parent->m_inbox.insert(m_this);

00209 // XXX optimize to only compute effects if sum >= parent.threshold?
00210 void PrimitiveTask::PrimitiveStateActionModel::compute_model()
00211 {
00212   m_sum = 0.0;
00213   m_r = 0.0;
00214   m_effects_map.clear();
00215 
00216   const StateDistribution &instances = m_average->basis_weights();
00217   StateDistribution::const_iterator a = instances.begin();
00218   StateTranslation::iterator b = m_translation.begin();
00219   while (a != instances.end()) {
00220     // Remove erstwhile instances
00221     while (b != m_translation.end() && b->first < a->first) {
00222       vector_set_erase(b->second->observers, m_this);
00223       b = m_translation.erase(b);
00224     }
00225     // Subscribe if necessary
00226     if (b == m_translation.end() || a->first < b->first) {
00227       PrimitiveStateActionData *data = m_parent->get_data(a->first);
00228       b = m_translation.insert(b, std::make_pair(a->first, data));
00229       vector_set_insert(b->second->observers, m_this);
00230     }
00231 
00232     // Add the weighted data for this instance
00233     m_sum += a->second * b->second->count;
00234     m_r += a->second * b->second->cumulative_reward;
00235     const EffectCounts &data_effects = b->second->effect_counts;
00236     EffectCounts::const_iterator i;
00237     for (i = data_effects.begin(); i != data_effects.end(); ++i) {
00238       EffectDistribution::value_type val(i->first, 0);
00239       LessFirst<EffectDistribution::value_type> comparator;
00240       EffectDistribution::iterator e =
00241         vector_set_insert(m_effects_map, val, comparator).first;
00242       e->second += a->second * i->second;
00243     }
00244 
00245     ++a; ++b;
00246   }
00247 
00248   // Remove erstwhile instances
00249   while (b != m_translation.end()) {
00250     vector_set_erase(b->second->observers, m_this);
00251     b = m_translation.erase(b);
00252   }
00253 
00254   // normalize
00255   m_r /= m_sum;
00256   EffectDistribution::iterator i;
00257   for (i = m_effects_map.begin(); i != m_effects_map.end(); ++i)
00258     i->second /= m_sum;
00259 
00260 //   debug(std::cout); //XXX
00261 
00262   if (m_sum >= m_parent->m_threshold)
00263     notify_model_observers();
00264 }

00266 void PrimitiveTask::PrimitiveStateActionModel::debug(std::ostream &out) const
00267 {
00268   out << "Primitive model of State " << state() << "\n";
00269   out << "\tsum = " << m_sum << "\n";
00270   out << "\tr = " << m_r << "\n";
00271   out << "\t" << m_effects_map.size() << " effects\n";
00272 }

00286 void PrimitiveTask::update(PrimitiveStateActionData *dat, double r)
00287 {
00288   ++dat->count;
00289   dat->cumulative_reward += r;
00290   std::vector<PrimitiveStateActionModelWeakRef>::const_iterator o;
00291   for (o = dat->observers.begin(); o != dat->observers.end(); ++o)
00292     m_inbox.insert(*o);
00293 }

00327 // get_data assumes that the StateVectorRef is canonical and will always remain alive.
00328 void DiscretizedPrimitiveTask::update(const StateVectorRef &s, double r, const StateVectorRef &succ)
00329 {
00330   AverageRef avg1 = m_discrete_averager->approximate(s);
00331   const StateDistribution &temp1 = avg1->basis_weights();
00332   assert(temp1.size() == 1);
00333   const StateVectorRef ds = temp1.begin()->first;
00334 
00335   AverageRef avg2 = m_discrete_averager->approximate(succ);
00336   const StateDistribution &temp2 = avg2->basis_weights();
00337   assert(temp2.size() == 1);
00338   const StateVectorRef dsucc = temp2.begin()->first;
00339 
00340   PrimitiveStateActionData *dat = get_data(ds);
00341   EffectCounts::value_type
00342     val(AbsoluteEffect::create(dsucc, m_discrete_averager->dimensions()), 0);
00343   AbsoluteEffectCountsComparator comparator;
00344   EffectCounts::iterator cnt =
00345     vector_set_insert(dat->effect_counts, val, comparator).first;
00346   ++cnt->second;
00347 
00348   PrimitiveTask::update(dat, r);
00349 }
00350 
00351 void DiscretizedPrimitiveTask::update(const StateVectorRef &s, double r)
00352 {
00353   AverageRef avg = m_discrete_averager->approximate(s);
00354   const StateDistribution &temp1 = avg->basis_weights();
00355   assert(temp1.size() == 1);
00356   const StateVectorRef &ds = temp1.begin()->first;
00357 
00358   PrimitiveTask::update(get_data(ds), r);
00359 }
